chunk_text: The house overlooks the 6th hole of the Woodlands golf course, so you can savor your morning coffee as you look out over the green from the large chef's kitchen with a Dacor range and two dishwashers. Or, take advantage of the oversized island to spread out take-out on if you don't want to cook! The brand new interior boasts 5 well-appointed bedrooms and 4 full baths that have enough space for everyone. A pool table, poker table, and hot tub on an expansive deck help round out your stay.
